Package com.arbibot.ports.output

Interface ForExchangeCommunication

public interface ForExchangeCommunication
Output port used to retrieve information from an exchange.
Since:
1.0
Author:
SChoumiloff, SebastienGuillemin

    Method
    Description
    List<Pair>

    Retrieve the list of available trading pairs on an exchange.

  • Method Details

    • getPriceForPair

      BigDecimal getPriceForPair(Pair pair, Exchange exchange)
      Retrieve the price for a pair on a specific exchange.
      Parameters:
      pair - the pair whose price needs to be retrieve.
      exchange - the exchange on which the price is retrieved.
      Returns:
      the price of a pair on a given exchange.

    • passOrders

      void passOrders(Order[] orders)
      Pass orders and update their status.
      Parameters:
      orders - the orders to pass.

    • getBalanceForAsset

      BigDecimal getBalanceForAsset(Asset asset, Exchange exchange)
      Retrieve the balance for a specific asset on a specific exchange.
      Parameters:
      asset - The asset to get the balance for.
      exchange - The exchange to get the balance from.
      Returns:
      BigDecimal The balance of the asset.

    • getOrderInfo

      Order getOrderInfo(String orderId, Exchange exchange)
      Retrieve information about the order whose ID is orderId on a exchange.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the order to get information about.
      exchange - The exchange to get the order information from.
      Returns:
      An Order corresponding to the orderId.

    • getAvailableTradingPairs

      List<Pair> getAvailableTradingPairs(Exchange exchange)
      Retrieve the list of available trading pairs on an exchange.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The exchange to get the trading pairs from.
      Returns:
      A List of available Pairs.
